summary: Verified all 5 UI improvements for Parcel Intake page investor demo. All tests PASSED: 1) Sidebar logo using servex-logo-full.png image, 2) Lighter placeholder text (placeholder:text-gray-400/60), 3) Darker auto-filled columns (text-gray-700), 4) Clear All button with gray outline disabled when no data, 5) Clear All confirmation dialog, 6) Unsaved warning modal with Save All/Discard/Cancel buttons.

issues: Console warning: '<tr> cannot be child of <span>' - React hydration issue (existing, non-blocking)

context_for_next_testing_agent: All 5 UI improvements for investor demo verified. Route: /parcels/intake. Clear All button data-testid='clear-all-btn', disabled when no data, shows confirmation dialog. Unsaved warning appears when navigating away with data.

1_SIDEBAR_LOGO_IMAGE.evidence: Sidebar logo is img element with src='/servex-logo-full.png' and alt='Servex Holdings'. Image file exists (251KB).

2_LIGHTER_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT.evidence: Description input has class 'placeholder:text-gray-400/60' with placeholder 'e.g., Electronics, Wine, Clothing'

3_DARKER_AUTO_FILLED_COLUMNS.evidence: Date, No, and Sender columns all have 'text-gray-700' class for darker text

4_CLEAR_ALL_BUTTON.evidence: Clear All button found with data-testid='clear-all-btn', gray outline style (text-gray-600 border-gray-300), disabled when no data entered

5_CLEAR_ALL_CONFIRMATION.evidence: Typing in description enables Clear All. Clicking shows AlertDialog with 'Clear all unsaved parcels?' title, Cancel and red Clear All buttons

6_UNSAVED_WARNING_ON_NAVIGATE.evidence: Clicking sidebar Dashboard link with unsaved data shows dialog 'You have 1 unsaved parcel' with Cancel, Discard, and Save All buttons

passed_tests: Sidebar displays servex-logo-full.png image instead of truck icon + text
Description placeholder 'e.g., Electronics, Wine, Clothing' has lighter opacity (placeholder:text-gray-400/60)
Date column uses text-gray-700 (darker than before)
No column uses text-gray-700 (darker than before)
Sender column uses text-gray-700 (darker than before)
Clear All button exists next to Save All with gray outline style
Clear All button disabled when no data entered
Clear All button enabled when description has text
Clear All confirmation dialog appears with Cancel and Clear All buttons
Unsaved warning modal appears when navigating away with data
Unsaved warning has Save All, Discard, and Cancel buttons
